candidate_item.description: Signature Page is completely missing from the budget submission
candidate_item.impact: Without proper signatures, the budget lacks official authorization and cannot be processed for approval

key_item.description: Signature Page is completely missing from the budget submission
key_item.impact: Without the required signatures, the budget lacks proper authorization and cannot be officially approved

candidate_item.description: Department name and fiscal year are missing from the headers of all sheets except Department Summary
candidate_item.impact: Lack of consistent headers makes it difficult to identify which department and fiscal year the sheets belong to

key_item.description: Department name and fiscal year are missing from the header of each sheet
key_item.impact: Without consistent headers, sheets may be misidentified or separated from the complete budget package

candidate_item.description: Percentage allocation for each quarter is not explicitly shown in the Quarterly Allocation sheet
candidate_item.impact: Without explicit percentages, it's difficult to verify if allocations follow required distribution patterns

key_item.description: The quarterly allocation percentages are not specified for each category
key_item.impact: Without specified allocation percentages, it's difficult to verify if the quarterly distribution follows requirements

candidate_item.description: Detailed explanation for increases exceeding 10% is missing in Budget Justification
candidate_item.impact: Several categories exceed the 10% increase threshold but lack the required detailed justification

key_item.description: Detailed explanation for increases exceeding 10% is missing for Equipment (14.7%) and Miscellaneous (15.6%)
key_item.impact: Significant budget increases require detailed justification to ensure proper fiscal oversight

candidate_item.description: Supporting Documentation is missing for equipment purchases over $5,000, professional services, travel expenses, and training plan
candidate_item.impact: Without supporting documentation, large expenditures cannot be verified or justified properly

key_item.description: Supporting Documentation is missing (quotes for equipment purchases over $5,000, contracts for Professional Services, etc.)
key_item.impact: Without supporting documentation, large expenditures cannot be verified or justified properly

candidate_item.issue: Equipment shows a 14.7% increase but lacks detailed justification required for increases over 10%
candidate_item.recommendation: Provide detailed justification for the 14.7% increase in Equipment expenses

key_item.location: Department Summary, Equipment row and Miscellaneous row
key_item.issue: Year-over-year increases exceeding 10% (Equipment at 14.7%, Miscellaneous at 15.6%) lack the detailed justification required
key_item.recommendation: Provide detailed justification for these increases in the Budget Justification section

unmatched_candidate.issue: Miscellaneous shows a 15.6% increase but lacks detailed justification required for increases over 10%

unmatched_candidate.recommendation: Miscellaneous expenses are within the 3% limit, so this is compliant

unmatched_candidate.issue: No evidence of Department Director signature as required by May 15, 2023
unmatched_candidate.recommendation: Obtain Department Director signature on the required Signature Page

unmatched_candidate.issue: Travel expenses are not itemized by purpose and destination as required
unmatched_candidate.recommendation: Provide detailed breakdown of travel expenses by purpose and destination

unmatched_candidate.issue: Personnel costs are correctly allocated equally across all quarters (25% each)
unmatched_candidate.recommendation: Personnel allocation is compliant with regulations

unmatched_candidate.issue: The sum of quarterly allocations ($2,502,000) matches the total annual request
unmatched_candidate.recommendation: Quarterly allocation totals are compliant with regulations

unmatched_key.issue: Parent account codes (1000, 2000, etc.) are used instead of the most specific account codes available
unmatched_key.recommendation: Use the most specific account codes available for each expense category

unmatched_key.issue: Equipment allocation is heavily weighted to Q1 (70%) without explanation for the non-standard allocation
unmatched_key.recommendation: Either adjust to standard 25% allocation or provide justification for the front-loaded allocation

unmatched_key.issue: The quarterly totals are uneven ($718,000, $597,500, $597,500, $589,000) without explanation
